title: martyns
author: martyns
created_time: February 20, 2023, 01:08:08 AMLast edit: February 22, 2023, 10:21:52 PM by martyns
content: With the way things dey go on for we country during this period of election,I dey sense war on election day,but I still believe say our government go fit tackle the problem wey dey come,and one advice i go try give be say make everybody dey dia dey,avoid anything wahala to avoid joining your ancestors on that date,because military men go dey to check every wrong movement around that ballon box.E go dey wise say we come out peacefully to vote the person wey dey our mind,and comot body for every problem we go lead us to death,and also to vote person wey dey competent and capable of leading us.

comments.author: Obari
comments.created_time: February 20, 2023, 04:14:47 PMLast edit: February 21, 2023, 08:09:53 PM by Obari
comments.body: Quote from: martyns on February 20, 2023, 01:08:08 AMWe thank God for the successful burial of Jacob Nkana, the father of one of our brother Igehbotz.The burial gave me an opportunity to see people I've been wishing and longing to see,like Brainboss,Obari,and other friends that made themselves available,it was really nice having you guys around.Having you guys as a family is the best thing that has ever happened to me.I plead you carry me along same way you've been carrying other of our brothers along.Thank you mates.The burial was a huge success and we were glad everything turned out fine.This matter no sharp to bring come here and even if you dey bring am come here, you forÂ  at least try drop this Grammer them, because for the least I Sabi, I know say plenty people no really happy for this our small community here but whatever the case be we dey together.Me personally I happy as I come out for that gathering despite my tight schedules and we pray the Almighty creator be with the family.Amen.

comments.author: Lida93
comments.body: We really thank the Almighty for the success of the burial and for journey mercy for all the padi men dem wey take time to attend am to honour our brother Igehbotz. All of una too much cos I been the see the photo Dem from una Whatsapp status na so family supposed be. As our people talk am say male got wey don mature na from far u go dey perceive de odor.... me personally never get to share much communication wit Igehbotz but from wetin I dey hear form close men about am, the man na correct snr man and I believe say na him good ways na mk men dem turn up for am from far and near. My prayer be say mk God continue de increase you and keep you strong all round.

comments.author: Marykeller
comments.body: Accept my deep condolences @Igehbotz. Sorry for the death of your father. This is my first time hearing this shocking news, see your papa die and una don burial am. If to sae I hear about am I for show face. Anyway, thank God sae the burial went successfully. Take heart my brother @Igheboz God knows the best. May God give your family the fortitude to bear the lossContinue to rest in the bosom of the Lord Mr. Jacob Nkana

comments.author: DaNNy001
comments.body: Wow never knew about this update but i would also like to show my deep condolences for your loss. The loss of life is what no man ever plans to experience in life but still these things are inevitable and still occurs to everyone. But just as you said the burial was successful, so thank God for everything and i would have also loved to meet some guys from the forum someday but as it seems, i have not such chances yet but I appreciate every one of you that made your presence felt there may God continue to bless all of you and the boss himself @ igheh Once again sorry the loss my man.

comments.author: Silver005
comments.body: Yes oooh that is it,he is want to join his or her ancestors should come on the election day in name of you want to hijacking the ballot box, what you don't know is that people have suffered and no longer give any room for ballot box hijacking this time,men are really ready for this election, so it's not advisable for anyone who is breathing air in and out in this country to act something fishy to avoid RIP for such person, and remember that person who may ask you to do that with the promise he might have make to you, remember his children is in abroad enjoying themselves and he is in his confort home watching you in a television where you are being kill while trying to snatch ballot box so be wise and use your brain..
